name: Healing of the Soil
description:
HEALING OF THE SOIL

This is Team 5's submission for the 2022 REGENERATE game jam!

The forest is dying and you are the only one that can help. Talk to the Tree of the soil and with his guidance regenerate the forest!

Controls:

WASD - movement

Shift - sprint

Left Mouse - Interact

ESC - exit game (WARNING IMMEDIATLY CLOSES GAME)
